name: HSP_BKT_ADDTL_REC
description:
Additional Payment Reconciliation Information


This table holds current information sent back by the payor at a later date. This can be after the account has been closed.


See table HSP_BKT_REC_HX for the history of these items.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.

columns.name: ADDTL_NA_AMT
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - Not allowed amount

columns.name: ADDTL_PAYOR_PMT
columns.description: This column stores the payer payment amount.

columns.name: ADDTL_NON_CVD_CHGS
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - Non-covered charges

columns.name: ADDTL_TOT_CHARGES
columns.description: This column stores the payer reported amount of total charges.

columns.name: ADDTL_REPORT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date on the report from the payer.

columns.name: ADDTL_REPT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Additional Payment Reconciliation Information - report type.
